content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Simple and fun.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Simple problem, perfect for clash in reverse mode nothing more to say !

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It is a fun and simple problem
ok so i don't know if u know but if put something in the goal or constraints to show us what to do wont appear in the CoC if you have reverse mode.

There are multiple rules which would pass all the test cases, and no way of knowing the "right" one to choose.

Examples:
"number of words + 2*number of words in ALLCAPS"
"number of words starting with a consonant + 3*number of words starting with a vowel"
"number of lowercase 'o's + 2*number of uppercase 'A's"

I think you need (a lot) more test cases to prevent this.

This will always be the case. The mathematical analogy is the following. If I give you 5 points on a line, you can go through them using a simple polynomial of degree 1, but you can also go through them using a crazy polynomial of degree 100.

I have added a new test case - it should make it harder to find another rule. Don't try too hard though, because you will find one if you really want to. :-)
The website would not allow me to submit the contribution without a goal so I wrote something generic.
